graph_title: Part des pays en développement et des pays les moins avancés dans les exportations mondiales
indicator_name: Part des pays en développement et des pays les moins avancés dans les exportations mondiales
SDG_GOAL: Goal 17: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
SDG_TARGET: Target 17.11: Significantly increase the exports of developing countries, in particular with a view to doubling the least developed countries' share of global exports by 2020
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 17.11.1: Developing countries' and least developed countries' share of global exports
STAT_CONC_DEF: Exports by developing countries and LDCs as a share of global exports of goods and services
